Package io.wcm.maven.plugins.nodejs.installation

Class NodeInstallationInformation

java.lang.Object
io.wcm.maven.plugins.nodejs.installation.NodeInstallationInformation
public class NodeInstallationInformation extends Object
Holds the general information about the node installation. Provides node and npm executables

    • forVersion

      public static NodeInstallationInformation forVersion(String version, String npmVersion, File directory) throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
      Creates a NodeInstallationInformation for a specific Node.js and npm version and directory
      Parameters:
      version - Version
      npmVersion - NPM version
      directory - directory
      Returns:
      NodeInstallationInformation
      Throws:
      org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - Mojo execution exception
